name: Cactus
description: A hardy plant that thrives in arid environments, requiring minimal water and care.

name: Fern
description: A lush, green plant that adds a touch of the tropics to any indoor space.

name: Orchid
description: An elegant and exotic plant, known for its beautiful and long-lasting flowers.

name: Succulent
description: A low-maintenance plant with thick, water-retaining leaves, perfect for beginners.

name: Bonsai
description: A miniature tree, meticulously cultivated to create a perfect balance of nature and art.
